3.「で なんの用なんだ？| お小言なら もう聞きたくないぜ。| マジメに やってる: So what do you want? I don't want to hear|another word about... I'm serious. I'm|serious.

11.<pipipi_mid>「超天道士を倒すため 魔界より訪れた使者。| 武闘魔ガウ: <pipipi_mid>From the demon world to defeat the|supernatural masters... The martial arts|demon Gaurad... That's what I really am...

But what a surprise. Just as I was about to|accomplish my goal, the supernaturalist was|stricken with an illness and on the verge of|
|death.
